name: Lie Captcha Bot
description: A Telegram Bot for verifying new group members by Emojis or Number Captcha. Made by @Jigarvarma2005.

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB URI for Saving Chat Settings. Video Tutorial Here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aXlF80Cn7iU

SUDO_USERS.description: Your Telegram User ID for using Admin commands. goto @JVToolsBot and send /id to get your id

SESSION_NAME.description: A Bot Session Name without Space.
